solution_line_template: She donates {percent_donated_num}% of her {initial_pairs} pairs of shoes so that's {percent_donated_decimal}*{initial_pairs} = <<{percent_donated_num}*{percent_factor}*{initial_pairs}={pairs_donated}>>{pairs_donated} pair of shoes she donates

She had {initial_pairs} shoes in her collection and donates {pairs_donated} so that leaves {initial_pairs}-{pairs_donated} = <<{initial_pairs}-{pairs_donated}={pairs_after_donation}>>{pairs_after_donation} pairs of shoes

She now has {pairs_after_donation} pairs of shoes and buys {pairs_bought} more pairs so her collection is now {pairs_after_donation}+{pairs_bought} = <<{pairs_after_donation}+{pairs_bought}={final_pairs}>>{final_pairs} pairs of shoes
